long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Beump is an automated meeting reminder designed to improve calendar hygiene. We want to save time in your day and ensure that the right people show up to your meetings, on time. Never ‘check in to see if we’re still on for this call’ 10 minutes into the meeting again! No more no shows!

Download the Beump extension and add it to your calendar invites so it can send out custom reminders to your meeting attendees the morning of to confirm their attendance.
